export_resultset_csv_default_options.desc: Export a ResultSet from asking a question as CSV with the default options
tests: 'Computer Name,Destination,Flags,"Folder Name Search with RegEx Match[No, Program Files, No, ]",Gateway,IP Address,Interface,Mask,Metric' == export_str.splitlines()[0]

export_resultset_csv_all_options.desc: Export a ResultSet from asking a question as CSV with true for header_add_sensor, true for header_add_type, true for header_sort, and true for expand_grouped_columns
tests: 'Computer Name: Computer Name (String),"Folder Name Search with RegEx Match[No, Program Files, No, ]: Folder Name Search with RegEx Match[No, Program Files, No, ] (String)",IP Address: IP Address (IPAddress),IP Route Details: Destination (IPAddress),IP Route Details: Flags (String),IP Route Details: Gateway (IPAddress),IP Route Details: Interface (String),IP Route Details: Mask (String),IP Route Details: Metric (NumericInteger)' == export_str.splitlines()[0]

export_resultset_json.desc: Export a ResultSet from asking a question as JSON with the default options
